value:
My emergency torte got crushed
in the last fight. I need to reinforce
my candy pouches.

I used to do any job for the right
price. I grew some standards after
I joined the Shepherds.

Hey, nice work out there. I think
it's time for a lollipop break,
$Nu.

Hey, do you know where the
good beehives are around here?
I'm running low on honey.

Hey, try a slice of this cake I made.
I think it needs something, but I
can't figure out what.

So I'm betting that you're
$Nu.$k$pI was hired to come say hello
to you. What, by whom? It was
$Nf.

Someone should reward me
for this!

A little sugar in my tank, and
watch out!
Sweet work.
I gotta say—that is pretty darn tasty.

I'm Gaius. You need a thief, I've
got the goods—as long as you keep
me in the sweet stuff.

Hey there. Seems like I've
been seeing a lot of you lately,
$Nu.$k$pHere to beg more candy off me?$k$pI'm not sharing this one, though—
it's my favorite right now. Packed
with sweet, sweet honey...$k$pHm? You don't want candy? You
got work for me, then? ...No?$k$pWait, you're not just here to spend
time with me, are ya? 'Cause that'd
make you a big ol' marshmallow.$k$pOnly softies try to build relationships
up for their own sake. And here you
are—soft as cotton candy.$k$pHeh. I changed my mind. Take the
honey candy. No reason—just my
way of saying thanks.
ふん！
せやっ！
Sugar!
I was a sucker...
What a cupcake!
Like candy from a babe.
Piece of cake.
Care for a treat?
Suckered...
Hmm...
Sugar...
You got orders for me or something?
You can leave the dirty work to me.
Spying, assassination, and burglary are my specialties. Decent lockpick, too.
Wanna try this coconut brittle? It's crunchy in all the right ways.
I've got sweet little treasures in every pocket and fold of this outfit.
Glad you summoned me here. It's a chance to scrounge up more sweets.
Yeah?
What now?
I hear ya.
